Detailed Description

CMA_CType_GB18030 gives the character type information in GB18030 encoding.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

cma::CMA_CType_GB18030::CMA_CType_GB18030 (  )  [protected]

Get the character type.

Parameters:
p pointer to the string to be checked
preType the chartype of the previous character
nextP the pointer of the next character, it can be 0
Returns:
the character type. Check whether is white-space character. White-space characters are " \t\n\v\f\r", and also space character in specific encoding.
Parameters:
p pointer to the character string
Returns:
true for white-space character, false for non white-space character. Check whether is a separator of sentence.
Parameters:
p pointer to the character string
Returns:
true for separator, false for non separator. Avoid invoked directly

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int cma::CMA_CType_GB18030::getByteCount ( const char *  p  )  const [virtual]

Get the byte count of the first character pointed by p, which character is in a specific encoding.

Parameters:
p pointer to the character string
Returns:
the count of bytes.
